articles.description: Last week, India saw the birth of its 100th unicorn when Google-backed neobank Open raised funds. Interestingly, 60% of these startups entered this coveted club of unicorns—startups valued at $1 billion or more—only in the last 17 months. Even as the rate at …

articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.title: SBI FD alert! Bank hikes interest rates on these fixed deposits, new rates effective from May 10 - Zee News
articles.description: SBI has announced revision in Interest Rates on Domestic Bulk Term Deposits (Rs. 2 Crores and above) with effect from May 10.
articles.content: New Delhi: SBI has announced revision in Interest Rates on Domestic Bulk Term Deposits (Rs. 2 Crores and above) with effect from May 10. The revised Interest rates on 'Domestic Bulk Term deposits (Rs… [+1469 chars]

articles.author: Kingshuk Dutta
articles.title: 2022 Mercedes-Benz C-Class Launched In India; Prices Start At Rs. 55 Lakh - carandbike
articles.description: Mercedes-Benz India has launched the 2022 C-Class luxury sedan, with prices starting at Rs. 55 Lakh (ex-showroom). The new-generation Mercedes-Benz C-Class sedan or the 'baby S', will be offered in three variants - C 200, C 220d and C 300d.
articles.content: Mercedes-Benz India has launched the new-generation C-Class, with prices starting at ₹ 55 Lakh, ₹ 56 lakh for the C 220d and going up to ₹ 61 lakh for the top-spec C 300d variant. The C-Class has bee… [+5322 chars]

articles.title: Adani Wilmar share price crashes: Check latest on NSE, BSE - India Today
articles.description: Adani Wilmar's share price on BSE was down by 4.99 per cent or 30.65 points at Rs 583.25.

articles.author: Sneha Kulkarni
articles.title: HDFC increases home loan interest rates - Economic Times
articles.description: Housing Development Finance Corporation (HDFC) has increased its Retail Prime Lending Rate (RPLR) on Housing Loans by 30 basis points, effective May 9, 2022.
articles.content: Housing Development Finance Corporation or HDFC Ltd has announced that with effect from May 09, 2022, it has increased its Retail Prime Lending Rate (RPLR) on Housing Loans by 30 basis points. This h… [+998 chars]
